attributes.action: Introduce British Sign Language into the schools curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: Raising awareness to deafness and hearing loss for young people. Learning sign language will automatically increase skill levels for young people and will increase understanding and communication between people. A lot of people are learning sign language in their own time but not enough or properly. We learn other languages but not a language to help thousands of people.
attributes.background: Adjust the school curriculum. We learn Modern foreign language but don’t learn Sign Language which many people have wanted to learn and have had to try and learn alone.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331031
